code: export function smoothScroll(targetId,duration){const target=document.getElementById(targetId);if(!target)return;const startY=window.scrollY;const targetPosition=target.getBoundingClientRect().top+window.scrollY;const distance=targetPosition-startY;const startTime=performance.now();function easeOutQuad(t){return t*(2-t);}function scrollStep(timestamp){const currentTime=timestamp-startTime;if(currentTime<duration){const progress=currentTime/duration;window.scrollTo(0,startY+distance*easeOutQuad(progress));requestAnimationFrame(scrollStep);}else{window.scrollTo(0,targetPosition);}}requestAnimationFrame(scrollStep);}
